InternalDamage.name: Internal Damage
InternalDamage.description: The area is an ugly shade of purple, and apparently very painful to touch. You suspect a bone might be broken.
InternalDamage.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to your internal injuries.

InternalDamage.name: Bite wounds
InternalDamage.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been mauled to death.

InternalDamage.name: Gunshot wound
InternalDamage.description: The entry site is a small, dark, bruised hole oozing a little blood. The exit wound however is a large ragged mess of exposed tissue and pouring blood.
InternalDamage.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of gunshot wounds.

Bleeding.name: Bleeding
Bleeding.description: Blood pours freely from this ragged and particularly nasty open wound

Burn.name: Burn
Burn.description: The area is blistered and red, and skin is already beginning to peel away in sheets. The patient is in a great deal of pain.

OxygenLow.name: Oxygen low
OxygenLow.description: The skin is pale and clammy, and the lips turning blue.

Stun.name: Stun
Stun.description: The patient is dazed and unresponsive.

Pressure.name: Barotrauma
Pressure.description: There is obvious massive organ damage and the blood vessels of the eye have burst, creating an unnerving red gaze.
Pressure.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been crushed by water pressure.

AfflictionHusk.name: Husk infection
AfflictionHusk.description: Something dark and unpleasant moves in the mouth. They are rendered completely mute, save for occasional clicking sounds apparently emanating from deep within the throat.
AfflictionHusk.causeofdeathdescription: Taken over by a husk parasite
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been taken over by the husk parasite.

AfflictionPsychosis.name: Psychosis
AfflictionPsychosis.description: The patient rants and mutters in an agitated fashion, a steady commentary of unseen events.

Affliction.description: The smell of alcohol rises from them like a vapor, their speech slurs a little, and their eyes fail to focus.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of alcohol poisoning.

Affliction.name: Opiate withdrawal
Affliction.description: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, as are the signs of nausea.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of opiate withdrawal.

Affliction.name: Opiate overdose
Affliction.description: The patient has pinpoint pupils and icy cold skin. They struggle to breathe and swallow.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of opiate overdose.

Affliction.name: Opiate addiction
Affliction.description: The patient is happy enough... so long as they get what they need.

Affliction.name: Radiation sickness
Affliction.description: Burns and sores can be seen on patient's skin. They seem to be spreading.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of radiation sickness.

Affliction.name: Morbusine poisoning
Affliction.description: Gradually progressing, movement hindering and relatively quick poisoning.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of morbusine poisoning.

Affliction.name: Sufforin Poisoning
Affliction.description: Sneaky, slowly progressing poisoning that eventually leads to death.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of sufforin poisoning.

Affliction.name: Deliriumine Poisoning
Affliction.description: Patient is hallucinating and exhibits paranoia.

Affliction.name: Cyanide poisoning
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of cyanide poisoning.

Affliction.name: Nausea
Affliction.description: The skin is clammy and the patient is vomiting periodically.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have choked on your own vomit.

BuffDurationIncrease.name: Slow metabolism
BuffDurationIncrease.description: Increases the duration of all buffs.

Affliction.name: Chem withdrawal
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of chem withdrawal.

Affliction.name: Sensory Overload
Affliction.description: The target's senses have been overloaded, deafening them and distorting their view.
